overview: They're all unique, they're each different, every single one is more breathtakingly beautiful than the last. As different as they may seem to the naked eye, they all share one thing in common: a ravenous hunger for lesbian sex. In SexArt Volume Two - Pink Kiss, you'll find six artfully evocative scenes featuring twelve of the most beautiful young women in the world as they explore and experiment with their most lustful desires. Enter the world of "Pink Kiss" and experience the most passionate and uninhibited sapphic sex films ever created. "Pink Kiss" - lesbian erotica as only SexArt can make it!
title: SexArt Volume Two
